15 template <typename T, typename S = typename tmetaTypeDef<T>::is>
16 class ttypeBase : public S {
17 typedef ttypeBase<T, S> _T;
18 NAMU_DECL_ME(_T, S)
19
20 public:
21 ttypeBase();
22

34 types& _getSupers() override;
35 types& _getSubs() override;
36 type& _getStatic() const override;

39
40 private:
41 ttypeBase(nbool); // for skipping recursive static variable init.
42 };

49
